testcase.classname: As a Customer I want to find a desired box and add it to the cart
testcase.name: Product page shows Ajouter au panier1 option,When click on Ajouter au panier, Article(s) ajouté(s) au panier2 overlay appears,The options Continuer mes Achats3, Voir le Panier4 and Vider le Panier5 are on the add to cart overlay,The product added to cart is on shopping cart page
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to smartbox homepage.......................................passed Then I see the homepage.....................................................passed When I hover to mainmenu item and select subcategory........................passed Then I see the products associated..........................................passed When I select product Y067..................................................passed Then I see the product page with Ajouter au panier button...................passed When I click Ajouter au panier button.......................................passed Then I see Articles ajoutes au panier Overlay with Continuer mes Achats, Voir le Panier and Vider le Panier.passed When I click Voir le Panier button..........................................passed Then I see the product added to cart........................................passed

testcase.classname: As a Customer I want to find a desired box and add it to the cart
testcase.name: A selected box can be removed from the cart
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to smartbox homepage.......................................passed Then I see the homepage.....................................................passed When I hover to mainmenu item and select subcategory........................passed Then I see the products associated..........................................passed When I select product Y067..................................................passed Then I see the product page with Ajouter au panier button...................passed When I click Ajouter au panier button.......................................passed Then I see Articles ajoutes au panier Overlay with Continuer mes Achats, Voir le Panier and Vider le Panier.passed When I click Voir le Panier button..........................................passed Then I see the product added to cart........................................passed When I click remove icon....................................................passed Then I see overlay to confirm...............................................passed When I click Yes,remove these items.........................................passed Then I see the product removed form cart....................................passed

testcase.classname: As a Customer I want to find a desired box and add it to the cart
testcase.name: No more than 5 boxes of each title can be purchased per time

testcase.name: When searching for a box by name on the main search field (top of the page), suggestions are displayed as the customer types,After selecting a category or sub-category, filter options are displayed,When searching for a box by name on a filter, suggestions are displayed as the customer types,Every Box page must display a link to the reviews section
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to smartbox homepage.......................................passed Then I see the homepage.....................................................passed And I see the search field..................................................passed When I search for a box by name.............................................passed Then I see suggestions displayed............................................passed When I select the category..................................................passed Then I see the filter options...............................................passed When I select custom types in filter........................................passed Then I see the search result with boxes.....................................passed And I verify every box page for link to review section......................passed
